LanguageData.yy_biomeExtractor.label: biome energy extractor
LanguageData.yy_biomeExtractor.description: Extracts energy shards from the biome. Depending on the working biome, the types of biome energy shards generated differ.
LanguageData.yy_distortA.label: Mote
LanguageData.yy_flashA.label: Mote
LanguageData.yy_flashB.label: Mote
LanguageData.yy_flashC.label: Mote
LanguageData.yy_flashD.label: Mote
LanguageData.yy_planetCore.label: planet energy core
LanguageData.yy_planetCore.description:
A key material for building planet energy teleporters.
To make this, you need biome energy shard.
Research machining and build a biome energy extractor on a specific biome to collect the energy shards you need.
LanguageData.yy_teleporter.label: planet energy teleporter
LanguageData.yy_teleporter.description: Lights from planetary energy fragments explain this device. We figured out how to make this device and that it is a device for moving to another planet, but we haven't figured out where this is pointing us. Those who made this seem to want us to come to them.
